import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { Button, Grid, Icon, Image, List } from "semantic-ui-react" import { formatCurrency } from "./../helpers/number-helper" const MenuItem = ({ item, viewDetail, addToCart }) => { const { image, name, price, itemId, isActive } = item const dispatch = useDispatch() const param = useParams() const activeItemHandle = () => { dispatch() } return ( {name} {formatCurrency(price)} {/* {description} */}
{isActive && viewDetail && ( <> )} {!isActive && ( )} {addToCart && ( )}
) } export default MenuItem
